leawind_third_person.text.title: Leawind's Third Person
leawind_third_person.option_category.cam: Adjust parameters like player position on the screen. You don't need to manually adjust options on this page, as you can hold Z in the game and use the mouse to adjust.
leawind_third_person.option_category.smo: Smooth factors determine the smoothness of the smoothing effect. A smooth factor of 0 is equivalent to no smoothing, reaching the target value immediately. 1 is equivalent to infinite smoothness, never reaching the target value.
leawind_third_person.option_category.aim: Rules for checking if it's aiming mode now
leawind_third_person.option_group.camera: Adjust the camera distance to the player by scrolling the mouse wheel when in third person. Here, you can set the adjustment range.
leawind_third_person.option_group.aiming: When aiming with bows, crossbows, spears, etc.
leawind_third_person.option_group.player: Make the player fade out in confined spaces to avoid obstructing the view.
leawind_third_person.option_group.adjust: By default, holding Z allows you to use the mouse to adjust the camera's offset and distance.
leawind_third_person.option_group.behavi: How the player rotates when pressing the interact key (attack, use, select).
leawind_third_person.option.is_mod_enabl: Disabling this will show the original third-person perspective, but you can still open the configuration screen with a key.
leawind_third_person.option.center_offse: Use 0 camera offset when attached entity is flying with elytra
leawind_third_person.option.player_fade_: Not actually 'fade out,' just suddenly invisible to avoid obstructing the view.
leawind_third_person.option.use_camera_p: Use camera pick in creative mode
In creative mode, player sight won't be blocked, you can interect with what crosshair aims at
leawind_third_person.option.lock_camera_: After locking, you cannot tilt the camera up or down.
leawind_third_person.option.player_rotat: Force Player to Rotate with Camera When Not Aiming
Force the player's line of sight to parallel the camera's line of sight when not aiming.
leawind_third_person.option.rotate_to_mo: Automatically Rotate Player to Moving Direction
Automatically rotate the player towards the direction of movement.
leawind_third_person.option.auto_turn_bo: Auto rotate body drawing a bow
When drawing the bow, automatically turn sideways so that the hand holding the bow is in front and the hand pulling the string is behind.
leawind_third_person.option.render_cross: Display a crosshair in aiming mode.
Display a crosshair in non-aiming mode.
leawind_third_person.option.available_di: Adjust the camera-to-player distance using the mouse wheel. This option represents the number of distance levels.
leawind_third_person.option.camera_dista: Minimum camera-to-player distance when using the mouse wheel to adjust. The player entity becomes invisible at this minimum distance (if this feature is enabled).
Maximum camera-to-player distance when using the mouse wheel to adjust.
leawind_third_person.option.adjusting_ca: Smooth Factor for Adjusting Camera Offset
Smooth factor for changes in camera offset as the mouse moves during camera adjustment.
leawind_third_person.option.adjusting_di: Smooth factor for changes in camera-to-player distance as the mouse wheel scrolls during camera adjustment.
leawind_third_person.option.distance_smo: When the player is stationary, the change in distance between the camera and the player is a smooth factor of the target distance.
Is player at the center of screen
leawind_third_person.option.offset_cente: Long-press a specific key to center the player. When centered, X offset is fixed at 0, and the player is in the middle of the screen. This option adjusts the Y offset in this centered state.
leawind_third_person.option.camera_ray_t: When aiming at an object beyond this distance, the player's line of sight becomes parallel to the camera's line of sight.
leawind_third_person.option.auto_rotate_: The player will automatically rotate when pressing the interact key (attack, use, select).
leawind_third_person.option.turn_with_ca: Turn Player with Camera Orientation when Entering First Person
When entering first-person view, make the player face in the same direction as the camera in the just-ended third-person view.
leawind_third_person.option.projectile_a: Automatically adjust the shooting angle to hit the target when aiming at blocks or entities.
leawind_third_person.option.hold_to_aim_: When the item player is holding matches any rule, auto enter aiming mode.
leawind_third_person.option.use_to_aim_i: When the item player is using matches any rule, auto enter aiming mode.
key.leawind_third_person.toggle_side: Toggle Camera to the Other Side
key.leawind_third_person.toggle_aiming: Short Press to Toggle Aiming State
